newsitem.title: SWEDEN: FORECAST-Avesta Sheffield Q1 profit 16 mln Skr.
newsitem.headline: FORECAST-Avesta Sheffield Q1 profit 16 mln Skr.

text.p: Swedish-British steel company Avesta Sheffield is expected to post a pre-tax profit of 16 million crowns for the financial year ending March 1997, a poll of analysts showed on Wednesday.
Forecasts ranged from a loss of 225 million crowns to a profit of 300 million.
For the 1997/98 financial year the consensus forecast was 1.04 billion crowns profit, the poll showed.
Inventory changes, steel prices and currency effects are expected to hit the result, making it difficult to forecast.
The result is due to be released on May 15.
Avesta Sheffield is 51 percent owned by British Steel. T he financial year for Avesta Sheffield runs from April 1996 to March 1997.
